description: Specifies the configuration data for a registered hook in CloudFormation Registry.

TypeArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the type without version number.
TypeArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the type without version number.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^arn:aws[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,64}:cloudformation:[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,64}:([0-9]{12})?:type/hook/.+$  

Update requires: No interruption

TypeName.description:
The name of the type being registered.

We recommend that type names adhere to the following pattern: company_or_organization::service::type.
TypeName.markdownDescription:
The name of the type being registered.

We recommend that type names adhere to the following pattern: company_or_organization::service::type.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}$  

Update requires: No interruption

ConfigurationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the configuration data, in this account and region.
ConfigurationArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the configuration data, in this account and region.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^arn:aws[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,64}:cloudformation:[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,64}:([0-9]{12})?:type(-configuration)?/hook/.+$  

Update requires: No interruption

Configuration.description: The configuration data for the extension, in this account and region.
Configuration.markdownDescription:
The configuration data for the extension, in this account and region.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: [\s\S]+  

Update requires: No interruption

ConfigurationAlias.description: An alias by which to refer to this extension configuration data.
ConfigurationAlias.markdownDescription:
An alias by which to refer to this extension configuration data.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,256}$  

Update requires: No interruption
